resources.string: Enter your name before you begin the quiz...
1. Which of the following is true about XML?
XML is a tag based language like HTML
XML tags are not predefined like HTML
Parsing XML refers to going through XML document to access data or to modify data in one or other way
Parsing XML refers to creation of XML document
5. Which of the following are legal identifiers in Java?
